name: Go
postCreateCommand: go version && go get -tool github.com/evilmartians/lefthook && go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports@latest && go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest && go tool lefthook install && LAZYGIT_VERSION=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/jesseduffield/lazygit/releases/latest" | grep -Po '"tag_name": "v\K[^"]*') && curl -Lo lazygit.tar.gz "https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/releases/latest/download/lazygit_${LAZYGIT_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz" && tar xf lazygit.tar.gz lazygit && sudo install lazygit /usr/local/bin && rm lazygit lazygit.tar.gz
